MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area today caused by a flooded network box and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29pm on 7th December 2020.
